TheCotton King Size Bedsheet range is made from 100% cotton. This range of doublebedsheets is made from cotton that has been combed to retain only long cottonbedding. The bedsheet has a beautiful luxurious sheen andsilky-smooth feel due to memorization process on the cotton.
